#### About

#### Projects

##### Front Facing Projects

###### Mind Trekker Demonstrations Sorter 

I built this sort for the Mind  Trekkers website. This sorter allows people to search for any of their  demonstrations. The demonstrations are stored in a google sheet. I used  JavaScript to make Ajax request on a PHP file to get this to work. The  PHP code uses a degree of fuzzy search to improve searching.

[View Live](https://www.mtu.edu/mindtrekkers/demonstrations/) 

[View On GitHub](https://github.com/lucasdamianjohnson/MTUProjects/tree/main/mindtrekkers) 

###### Research Project Sorter

 I completely rebuilt this for the new CMS. It pulls from multiple databases to make a searchable list of all the current research projects.  

[View Live](https://www.mtu.edu/research/about/current/) 

[View On GitHub](https://github.com/lucasdamianjohnson/MTUProjects/tree/main/research-projects) 

###### Campus Directory 

I rebuilt this tool using PHP,  JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. It loads search results via Ajax request and  has a complicated set of filters. 

[View Live](https://www.mtu.edu/directory/) 

[View On GitHub](https://github.com/lucasdamianjohnson/MTUProjects/tree/main/campus-directory) 

###### Mentions Page

I created the generation and pagination for this page. 

[View Live](https://www.mtu.edu/news/mentions/) 

[View On GitHub](https://github.com/lucasdamianjohnson/MTUProjects/tree/main/mentions) 

##### Back Facing Projects

###### Site Export And Move

When I first started for UMC they were using Rythmx which was an older  Java-based CMS. I was tasked to find a way to export all the sites into  files that OU Campus could read. So, I made this script that takes a  site map and grabs all the necessary data and produces a copy of the  site that can be simply uploaded to OU Campus.

[View On GitHub](https://github.com/lucasdamianjohnson/MTUProjects/tree/main/site-export) 

###### Image Crop Gadget

I was tasked with remaking the image cropping gadget for OU campus. I  have basically rebuilt this gadget. The gadget allows a user to crop  images sizes that we pre-determine. This allows all images on the site  to have desired aspect ratios for the best cross-platform experience.  The gadget also stores previous crops in a database so new sizes can be  cropped with the same selected area.

[View On GitHub](https://github.com/lucasdamianjohnson/MTUProjects/tree/main/image-gadget) 

###### Publish All Content Types Gadget

This is another gadget for OU Campus. It allows you to publish out all files of a specific type.

[View On GitHub](https://github.com/lucasdamianjohnson/MTUProjects/tree/main/publish-all-gadget) 

###### Image Crop Script

This is a script that I made that we inject on pages to crop down the size of images to increase mobile performance.

[View On GitHub](https://github.com/lucasdamianjohnson/MTUProjects/tree/main/image-crop)
